name: Scizor
flavorText:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

previous.name: Qwilfish
previous.flavorText:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

next.name: Shuckle
next.flavorText:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.flavorText:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

pokemon.name: Scizor

It has a steel-hard body. It

pokemon.name: Kleavor
pokemon.flavorText:
A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes
and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon
this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
